name: telemetry-viewer
description: A simple application based on flespi.io and built with Quasar. That displays devices telemetry.
author: Sergei Buntsevich <sebu@gurtam.com>

scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && npm run build && rm -rf deploy && mkdir deploy && cp -R dist/pwa-mat/* misc LICENSE package.json deploy && cp README.md deploy/README.md && node_modules/git-directory-deploy/bin/git-directory-deploy.sh -ddeploy -bgh-pages -rhttps://git.gurtam.net/flespi/frontend/TelemetryViewer.git && rm -rf deploy && git push github gh-pages
